lead_paragraph: The company’s move reflects a deeper shift in longstanding unease among executives doing business in China.

headline.seo: Google Is Not Alone in Discontent, but Its Threat Stands Out
headline.main: Google Is Not Alone in Discontent, but Its Threat to Leave Stands Out
headline.sub: Google Is Not Alone in Discontent,  But Its Threat Stands Out;
headline.print_headline:
Google Is Not Alone in Discontent,
But Its Threat Stands Out

snippet: The company’s move reflects a deeper shift in longstanding unease among executives doing business in China.

byline.contributor: Keith Bradsher reported from Hong Kong and David Barboza from Shanghai. Michael Wines contributed reporting from Beijing.
byline.original: By KEITH BRADSHER  and DAVID BARBOZA
